text:
StackShare | San Francisco, CA | Full-time, ONSITE

Tech: Rails/PostgreSQL/AngularJS http://stackshare.io/stackshare/stackshare

We're the fastest growing community for SaaS tools - we show you all the software a company is using and why. We're a developer-only community of engineers, CTOs, and VPEs from some of the world's top startups. Weâ€™re building LinkedIn for the $150B SaaS industry, starting with dev tools. We're backed by 500 Startups (Batch 14) and we're based in San Francisco.

We currently have openings for the following positions:

  - Lead Engineer
  - Engineering Intern
  - Developer Evangelist (Part-time and Remote OK)
  - Community Manager (Part-time and Remote OK)
  - Growth Marketing Intern (Part-time and Remote OK)
Details about the roles here: https://angel.co/stackshare/jobs

Mention this post in an email to yonas@stackshare.io, would love to chat!
